body:
So, I'm making some of them and this is the very first. Feel free to request map or scenarios so I make one of it. This one is on FoG (Fields of Green) which is the lobby map for Avicus at the moment. Everything was made using Photoshop CS6.



Please leave your opinions as well as ideas for other wallpapers coming down the road!
body_tagged:

title: Some cool Avicus Network Wallpapers (FullHD)

replies.body:
It looks nice but  it is not really clear, you can just make out what it is,



GREAT JOB though, it looks sweet '_'

replies.body:
I dont mean to be rude.. but all this is is just a filter being applied. (2 if you count the blurred border)

Props for doing it tho.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
I'm not going to lie, I didn't spend lots of time on this but I really want to keep them simple; the idea "the more filters the best" wasn't in my mind when doing this.

Thanks anyways :)
